summary: HARD/ROUGH SHIFTING UP IN GEARS AND SAME DOWN SHIFTING IN GEARS. SHAKING/JERKING/SHUDDERING AT SPEEDS APX. 20-70 MPH. TRANSMISSION CAN DOWN SHIFT SO HARD, AT TIMES, IT FEELS LIKE SOMEONE HIT YOUR FROM BEHIND. WANTS TO STALL/SLIP SHIFTING UP IN GEARS.  SEEMS TO HAVE TOO MUCH FREE PLAY IN DRIVELINE WHILE SITTING STILL SHIFTING FROM DRIVE TO REVERSE. MAKES A CLUNK SOUND.
